00001 import copy
00002 def bottom(pop, genomes, random_mod, to_replace):
00003     pop.sort()
00004     genome_len = len(genomes)
00005 
00006     for i in xrange(to_replace):
00007         pop[i] = copy.deepcopy(genomes[i%genome_len])
